name: Cloak of the Unseen Path
tooltip:
Cloak of the Unseen PathLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Regal Drape, 2 Lambent Idols, 5 Stone Scarabs and 5 Crystal Scarabs to Keyl Swiftclaw in Silithus.  You must also obtain Revered reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Regal Drape
- Lambent Idol x 2
- Stone Scarab x 5
- Crystal Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
